name: Balance Check
detail: Our joints need strong muscles to maintain the body's balance

name: Flexibility and Mobility
detail: For efficient movement, our joints need to move through its full range

name: Posture
detail: An altered posture is linked to muscle dysfunction and poor joint position

name: Strength and Endurance
detail: Strong muscles prevent joint injuries and improve endurance as we age

name: Functional
detail: Quality of muscle health to aid daily activities that enhance everyday fitness
